item.title: Easter Basket
item.dc:creator: @stnbarton12 stnbarton12
item.description:
@stnbarton12 wrote:

I tried to add The Easter Basket to my server on wearitem.java here is what i have.

if(c.wearId == 4565) { c.startAnimation(1836); if (c.wearSlot == 3) if (c.playerEquipment[c.wearSlot] == 4565) return; }

How can i make the animation keep going?
